        Returns:

      • saveOrUpdate

        java.util.Optional<UserRequest> saveOrUpdate​(UserRequest userRequest)
        Method for saving a UserRequest if it doesn't exist or updating it if already exists (a UserRequest is identified by email)
        Parameters:
        userRequest - : the UserRequest to be saved or updated
        Returns:
        an Optional - null, if the userRequest was successfully saved or updated - the userRequest (email already exists)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if userRequest is null
